articles.content:
IDFC First Bank on May 30 said that its board has approved issuing of shares worth Rs 3,200 crore on a preferential basis at a price of Rs 80.63 per equity share, amounting to Rs 3,200 crore.

articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: Libas raises $18 Mn in maiden external round from ICICI Venture's fund - Entrackr
articles.description: Fast fashion omnichannel ethnic wear brand Libas has raised Rs 150 crore ($18 million) by IAF Series 5, a fund managed by ICICI Venture.

articles.title: Bank frauds up nearly 300% in last two years, digital frauds up 708%: RBI - The Economic Times
articles.description: Fraud cases in Indian banks surged to 36,075 in FY24 from 9,046 in FY22, a nearly 300% increase, while the amount involved dropped by 46.7% to Rs 13,930 crore. Most frauds occurred in digital payments, but the highest value frauds were in loan portfolios, wit…
articles.content: An analysis of frauds reported across banks has shown that the number of fraud cases reported in FY24 were 36,075, up nearly 300 per cent from the 9,046 cases reported in FY22. However, the amount in… [+1631 chars]
